entry.def: Jesus or Jesus Christ is the name of the man who Christians believe was the son of God, and whose teachings are the basis of Christianity.

entry.tran: （用于表示惊讶、震惊或厌烦，可能具冒犯意味）天哪，哎呀
entry.def: Jesus is used by some people to express surprise, shock, or annoyance. This use could cause offence.

means.word_mean: 1. a teacher and prophet born in Bethlehem and active in Nazareth; his life and sermons form the basis for Christianity (circa 4 BC - AD 29)
